#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
inline int inp()
{
int noRead=0;
char p=getchar_unlocked();
for(;p<33;){p=getchar_unlocked();};
while(p>32)
{
noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
p=getchar_unlocked();
}
return noRead;
};
int main()
{
    int n,t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        n=inp();//scanf("%d",&n);
        n=(int)sqrt(n);
        printf("%d\n",n);
    }
}
